original_text: You and your family will be happy to worship the Lord your God, at the special place that he chooses. Enjoy time together with your children, your servants and the Levites who live in your town. Also join with the foreign people who live among you, with widows, and children who have no family. Worship God happily together.
korean_text: 너와 네 자녀와 노비와 네 성중에 있는 레위인과 및 너희 중에 있는 객과 고아와 과부가 함께 네 하나님 여호와께서 자기의 이름을 두시려고 택하신 곳에서 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할지니라

sentences.original_text: You and your family will be happy
to worship the Lord your God
at the special place that he chooses
Enjoy time together with your children
and the Levites who live in your town
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 동네에 사는 레위 사람들과

sentences.original_text: Also join with the foreign people who live among you
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 너희 중에 사는 외국인들과 함께하라

sentences.original_text: and children who have no family
